vkopenurldef.name: KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_SHELL_ip
vkopenurldef.url: /sbin/ifconfig en0 | grep inet | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | grep -v inet6 | awk '{print $2}' | tr -d "addr:" | tr -d "\n" | pbcopy

vkopenurldef.name: KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_JXA_keystroke_HelloWorld
vkopenurldef.url: osascript -e ' tell application "System Events" keystroke "Hello, World!" keystroke return keystroke "Hello, World!" keystroke return end tell '
